name: Cursed (itch) (averyrand)
description: in a world where monsters walk the streets of Transylvania by night and coexist with humans, but one monster (Dracula) wants to control the world by controlling all the monsters. However, one species of supernatural can resist his control, the werewolves. Although one werewolf by the name Gabriel will fight back and stop the dreaded vampire and have humans and monsters live in peace ounce again.
